metadata.title: CVE-2018-14574 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
django.middleware.common.CommonMiddleware in Django 1.11.x before 1.11.15and 2.0.x before 2.0.8 has an Open Redirect.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.6
python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.6
python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.7-1ubuntu5.6').
